title: Roman Debelko
text:
Roman Mykolayovych Debelko (; born 8 August 1993) is a Ukrainian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Kryvbas%20Kryvyi%20Rih%20%282020%29">Kryvbas Kryvyi Rih</a>.
Career.
Debelko is a product of the FC Prykarpattya and FC Metalurh Donetsk youth sportive schools.
